website_summaries.verdict: The Klipsch Reference R6i On-Ear headphones deliver powerful bass response paired with enough crisp highs to keep things fairly balanced.
pros: Powerful audio performance with intense bass-forward sound signature

customer_reviews.title: Love them..
customer_reviews.text: Bass heavy yes, but they bring it a ton of detail also. I have always been a fan of the Klipsch headphones, and to see a set that has bass emphasis of this nature is somewhat surprising. But for me, in a very good way. I can eq out the basic I want, and have great and crisp sound. Not to mention, they drown out the loud people in my office, so I can concentrate on work.. I havening but good things to say about them. And they are extremely light and comfortable to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Not good for anybody who might snag the wires..
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. The memory foam / leather combination makes them the most comfortable pair of headphones I have ever owned. The only problem is the lack of reinforcement on the wiring. I snagged the wire once and the right ear cup doesn't produce sound making this $100 purchase useless. No wonder. There is virtually nothing keeping the wires on the inside protected against this type of accident.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Puncher

customer_reviews.title: Not same quality as Klipsch speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the sound quality of these headphones have purchased Klipsch speakers in the past. The quality the headphones would be the same. I purchased this versus the Bluetooth earbuds because the delay. These are the same headset they use in the rock and roll Hall of Fame. I suspect the higher price items are much better will not buy this again would like to return it already threw away the Box screwed myself
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bass that makes action sequence comes alive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cans primarily for watching movies on my laptop during my freetime. Sound: Excellent Bass that makes action sequence come alive, like the boom of the explosion, the zipping of bullets and the clear vocals. I dont need to go and turn on those annoying subtitles to see if im hearing the dialogue correctly. Overall, excellent value for money. Very seldom you can find a headphone for less than $50 with this sound quality. Earpads are comfortable and I can barely feel it while watching movie/tv marathons.
customer_reviews.author: John John Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones - Ear cups deteriorate and can't be replaced over time
customer_reviews.text: This is my second headphone from this company. For the price, it's worth having to replace them when the ear cups start to crumble, which happened on my first headphones after six years. The company's website does not offer a replacement on the foam cups which is unfortunate. I also could not find any size of ear cup that matched on other online markets. So, I had to throw away a perfectly good set of headphones; but I'm willing to buy a second set because of the low price for the great quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ty M

customer_reviews.title: A high quality bargain
customer_reviews.text: Nice item works with apple pdts; it functions with a mic on iPhone 7 with the phones dongle, it works well listening to music and books on tape via the MacBook Pro or iPad. The set is a bargain, its well made and shipped quickly. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch has done it again without question the best pair of on ear head phones under 100 dollars ...
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch has done it again without question the best pair of on ear head phones under 100 dollars I've ever heard blows away similar Bose cans selling for a lot more, thanks to klipsch and Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Huston

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great when played through a mobile device. They sound very clear with a smooth tone that doesn't get harsh. The sound is fairly bass heavy but not to the point where music sounds unnatural. The bass can be deep or punchy depending on the music played. Overall, they make most songs sound pleasing. They are comfortable to wear over an extended period of time. You really can't ask for much more for around $50.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding audio + iPhone/iPad/PC compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with iPhone5/iPad3 as well as Dell Latitude laptop with Windows 7 Professional and Enterprise. Sound range and quality is so exceptional that I almost missed my Webex due to playing music videos--try Hooked on a Feeling as well as Star Wars Imperial March among others. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: gotham

customer_reviews.title: mic is good at focusing the call on your voice less background ...
customer_reviews.text: klipsch R6i On-Ear Headphones rock. Wish they would make one specifically for Android devices so you could use the volume controller on the cord. Main reason I bought it was for phone calls, audio is spectacular on the mic and in the earphones, mic is good at focusing the call on your voice less background noise picked up. Buy em'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphone!
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch has always sold quality products. Will always be my first choice of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch, still one of the best. 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound and very comfortable on top of that. Bought these mostly for my Nintendo Switch and they do a great job, very crisp and clear. O and it works great with my 6s+ as well.
customer_reviews.author: Old-Man-B

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. Seller was quick to ship and the price was fair for the quality of these headphones. Not as good or comfortable as Bose, but good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these as I gave him my last set and I purchase another for him!
customer_reviews.author: Mongo3

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I've always like listening to Klipsch. These are a great deal for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Aldana

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are light weight, very comfortable on the ears for a couple of hours. The sound is very rich, from lows to highs, and the built quality is great. One minor issue - the earcups rotate outwards, so when you want to take a break and place them on your chest (hanging from your neck) you will need to take them off first.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever used, clean sound great bass!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for a killer price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it would be hard to beat. Very good sound, strong bass low end which I "equalize" down a bit. Rather this to never enough bass. Great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Scoble

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality and build quality are just great.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $40 for an open box item and the product looked brand new. For that price, the sound quality and build quality are just great.
customer_reviews.author: HARRINGT0N

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I did not see anything in the ad that started it was an ipod only product. It does not fit any of my devices so I will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kampman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Hurts ears a little after long term use but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son. He had a similar pair by Klipsch in the past and wanted a new set. Price was great and he was very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: skinnychic8

customer_reviews.title: Noise reduction missing on mic
customer_reviews.text: The mic is the reason i give a 3 Star rating. The headphones are good at reducing noise but the mic pics up all ambient sound. Not good for a open seating workplace.
customer_reviews.author: LET

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s portable and the sound quality is excellent. I use it for my iPod....I really like it, and you can’t beat the price. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice headphones. I bought them for my daughter and now I am her hero. She loves the bass. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: dan a johnson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and frail. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the headphones until the very flimsy connector broke off when I unplugged from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. R. Lucchini

customer_reviews.title: Been a fan of Klipsch since the '70's
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of Klipsch since the '70's and these headphones live up to what I remember. Not too big and pretty light for headphones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Stalcup

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love em! Not exactly what I was looking for but good non the less!
customer_reviews.author: william meeks

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. However cable not detachable which may break if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Denis H.

customer_reviews.title: They were certainly much better than some of the wanna-be phono-philes were panned them ...
customer_reviews.text: They are everything I had hoped for. They were certainly much better than some of the wanna-be phono-philes were panned them - and idiotically compared them with head sets which cost 3 to 4 times what I paid for these Klipsch. Most sensible true phono-philes who want orchestra pit sound quality get a home or studio sound system - not head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond A. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch does not have replacement ear pads.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the headphones a lot, but I lost one of the ear pad covers, and wrote Klipsch to try and get a replacement. Not only did they NOT have a replacement, they couldn't tell me where to get one, or give me the size I needed. Now these are useless. The customer support was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: jumpit

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for around a month. Sound quality is decent but build quality for my unit atleast was not. I was walking between classes and when I went to put them back on the ear piece for the right side was just gone. I didn't even know they were removable. Least to say I'm disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: George Varghese

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: sound awesome, hurt my ears. Currently collecting dust in the case
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is pretty good. However my husband keeps barrowing my Bose ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good. However my husband keeps barrowing my Bose headphones because he "left his at work". I am not sure he likes them because mine are always missing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for under $30; perfect for a portable to/ from school or gym set of headphones. Both of our boys have a pair. Microphone provides great pick-up whether you are recording onto a laptop or talking on the phone. The only wear showing right now on the oldest set is some of the wiring became exposed after the tubing ripped off (mis-use). Just a little electrical tape and everything was great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price and despite the model being a few year old, the Klipsh r6 and r6i on-ear headphones are simply unmatached. Shame they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Christian El-Shamma
